description: Remember 2011’s Ryan Reynolds-helmed Green Lantern movie? Honestly, how could anyone forget it? That said, director Martin Campbell actually thinks it “would’ve been great” with one big tweak: Reynolds writing the script.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine is getting a surprise Master Crafted Edition, launching June 10 on PC and Xbox Series X and S, and straight into Game Pass. No PS5 version was announced.
title: Original Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine Gets Surprise Master Crafted Edition on PC and Xbox Game Pass — but There’s No PS5 Version

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Dawn of War is back! Relic has announced Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition, an updated version of its beloved RTS first released over 20 years ago. As a huge fan of the original 2004 game, I just had to find out more. So, like a well-trained Inquisitor, I tracked down design director Philippe Boulle and quizzed him on this most welcome of grimdark revivals.
title: The Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Definitive Edition Interview: 'I Am Going Back and Fixing Typos I Made 20 Years Ago'

description: Owlcat Games has announced Warhammer 40,000: Dark Heresy, its next cRPG following the well-received Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Here’s a rundown of everything announced at Warhammer Skulls 2025, with enough trailers to satisfy even the grumpiest of Inquisitors.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 has just revealed Siege, its upcoming take on the classic Horde mode. There’s a debut teaser trailer, screenshots, and initial details on how it will work. But, as a big Warhammer 40,000 and Space Marine 2 fan, I wanted to know more. So I sent over a list of questions to Tim Willits, Chief Creative Officer at developer Saber Interactive, to answer my burning questions. I got some interesting replies.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Developer Saber Interactive Answers IGN's Burning Questions on Siege Mode, Dreadnoughts, and Future Seasons

description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 has revealed Siege, the final name for the hotly anticipated Horde mode coming to the explosive third-person action shooter as part of Patch 8.

description: Fortnite's return to iPhone and iPad has seen the game storm to the top of the App Store charts — at least in the U.S., where Epic Games' battle royale is finally available once again.

description: If you thought Season 1 and 2 of Squid Game were intense, you haven’t seen anything yet. The beloved Netflix drama is returning for Season 3 — and this time, those of you who are afraid of heights, beware, because creator Hwang Dong-hyuk is returning to that fear in a major way.
title: Don't Look Down: Squid Game Season 3 Will Play on Your Fear of Heights

description: Not done collecting all the cards in Pokemon TCG Pocket's Celestial Guardians Expansion, which dropped literally just three weeks ago? Too bad. Here comes another expansion. It's called Extradimensional Crisis, it'll be out on May 29, and it features the wacky-looking Ultra Beasts and creepy chimera Pokemon Type: Null.
title: Type: Null and the Ultra Beasts Join Pokemon TCG Pocket in New Extradimensional Crisis Expansion

description: Silent Hill f is not a sequel to any of the existing Silent Hill games. Instead, much like Silent Hill 2, it will offer a standalone story, "independent from the series."

description: As of May 22, Magic: The Gathering’s Marvel’s Spider-Man preorder bundle is live again on Amazon, with price protection in place.
